channel.title: Im not one to yell hlp but, meh, HELP PLEASE!
channel.description:
ok, On my music tab it *had* a summoning book Now they are shops that require PK points to open (Go me)
One problem, i get down to after the last thing to summon and i dont know how to link the cases together. EG (My first shop and case) [code]ase 101: if(pkpoints >= 10) { openUpShop(1); } else { sendMessage("You need more PK points, go own some noobs"); } break;[/code]
Thats the case, this is the music tab thing
[code]if(pkpoints >= 10) sendQuest("@gre@General Store", 11941); // npc = 101 else sendQuest("General Store", 11941); // npc = 101[/code] and thats what it looks like on music tab.....
I noticed how its "case 101" and its got // npc = 101
But Npc = 101 is Slashed out?
Im Confused

item.title: Im not one to yell hlp but, meh, HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

so, its
if(pkpoints >= 1500)
sendQuest("@gre@White Shop", 12128);
else
sendQuest(“White Shop”, 12128);

And the case
case 47096:

break;

?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 11:02:07 AM[/size][hr][quote=“LeScape Pk, post:10, topic:116756”]heres an idea, click the button and look on runserver.bat, it’ll give you an action button id, then add a case with that id under

//clicking most buttons

and add

openUpShop(#)

in the case…voila.[/quote]
case 185: //clicking most buttons
actionButtonId = misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
println_debug("Case 185: "+actionButtonId);
switch(actionButtonId) {
//These values speak for themselves
//case 4126: windstrike break;
Confused i am

item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“God Tricky, post:11, topic:116756”][quote author=LeScape Pk link=topic=166074.msg1546240#msg1546240 date=1182892722]
heres an idea, click the button and look on runserver.bat, it’ll give you an action button id, then add a case with that id under

//clicking most buttons

and add

openUpShop(#)

in the case…voila.
[/quote]

o, i got the code from clicking it and it gave me Case 185: Action button:47096

so i add it like this sendQuest("@red@YOUR TEKST HERE", 47096);
and for the piece of code i add
case 47096:

break;

Yeah, i got that much lol[/quote]I SAID OTHER MOUSE BUTTON! for the tekst ID !

so i add it like this sendQuest("@red@YOUR TEKST HERE", 47096); is rong

the ID shows next to the name in an extra box not in the Dos the sendquest ID is never the same as the case ID.

as for the rest Lescape i sadi that before xerocheez made it so noobs cant copy it but its fairly easy for someone who lnows minor java to release how to copy or add more npc,s like i did 8 months ago.

anyway the least u can do is reply me for the help i gave u god tricky…

item.title: Im not one to yell hlp but, meh, HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @God_Tricky God Tricky
item.description:
@God_Tricky wrote:

LeScape Pk:

what do you mean (go me) I had a tut basicaly just like that before the wipe… -.- and xerocheez made it so no one could copy his summoning, you’ll have to find a way around it…might I suggest the highlight + backspace option on his method?

i said go me because its not every day you see a server with shops on the music tab… and i dident see your tut obviously because i wouldn’t be asking questions now would i?
All im saying that iv managed to re-write Xeros summoning stuff with shops. altho i did ask just last night how you replace them. iv managed to add my own work into it. Eg, on my pk server you chose a class at first login and i have certain shops for certain classes. also, i made it so you cannot make yourself multy classes without having Pkpoints…come tri it out sometime =D
See for yourself…and by the way, i have a ::credits command and it notes codes taken from moparscape members therefore im not entirely taking credit.

I tri to learn as much as i can about java coding even if it means needing some help from time to time

Read full topic

item.description:
@getsome wrote:

well maybe you should spell better and be more clear ok listen up now

if ure using moparscape 3 and ure admined into the client.java

u should be able to find the cases manually…

click on the music u want to change the case from
now look onto ure dos (server window) its wil lsay case 185 : then another case number

this last case number is the number u need (when clicked starts the thing u stated)

now to change the tekst you go to the mssuic u just clicked and other mouse button there will be a number next to the name sendQuest("@red@YOUR TEKST HERE",12128); change that number to the number next to the name and add it.

item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

[quote=“God Tricky, post:3, topic:116756”]nice, xero is smart, and so are you.

So, you dont need to put Case 101: or w/e it is?

do i just add it straight after the last break;

Like

break;
if(pkpoints => 10)}
and so on?
[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 08:03:41 AM[/size][hr]So i can go

Case 8139: <Made up
if(pkpoints => 10)}
openUpShop(1);
sendMessage(“Testing shop”);
SummonNewNPC(NPCID);
}
else{
sendMessage(“Test”);
}
break;

and have the visual on the music tab

if(pkpoints >= 10)
sendQuest("@gre@Test shop",12128);
else
sendQuest("@red@Test Shop",12128);
}

And aslong as its under the last one, its going to work?[/quote]remove the summonnewnpc method in that case also after if pkpoint… u need to change } in a {

and its <= not =<

now u can place this in the refreshsummonbook void

if(pkpoints >= 10)
sendQuest("@gre@Test shop",12128);
else
sendQuest("@red@Test Shop",12128);
}

just look at the other stuff in there and yull figure out (i hope) u can rename refreshsummonbook but dont forget to rename the methods leading to that void get renamed aswell.

item.title: Im not one to yell hlp but, meh, HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

xeromade a method so noobs could not copy hes summoning

case 101 = the npc ID a goblin

but these cases are not the cases of the music list (thej are just NPC ID,s converted to Cases)

you can delete them since you dont need them.

Down allot search for

summonnewnpc u will see

case…
summonnewnpc(101);
break;

you just add

[code]if(pkpoints >= 10) {
openUpShop(1);
}
else {
sendMessage(“You need more PK points, go own some noobs”);
}

[code/]
into that first case.

and so on…
i also noticed a litle error its like this

if(pkpoints >= 10) sendQuest("@gre@General Store", 11941); // npc = 101 else sendQuest("@red@General Store", 11941); // npc = 101[/code]
